title: LA-24-12: Incoming Employees and Ongoing Interests in Representational Services: Common 18 U.S.C §§ 203 and 205(a)(1) Issues and Solutions
summary: This Legal Advisory reviews the elements of 18 U.S.C. §§ 203 and 205(a)(1), common types of payments that may implicate the statutes, and resolutions for when such payments arise.
